input.prompt:
Fix the code for Phase 3: Task Item HTML/CSS Structure

GOAL:  Create the visual template for task items with all styling for normal, completed, and hover states

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA:
- Task item has white background (#ffffff), 1px solid #e0e0e0 border, 6px border-radius
- Task item has 12px 16px padding, flexbox layout with centered items, 12px gap
- 8px vertical space between task items
- Checkbox is 20px × 20px with 2px solid #e0e0e0 border and 4px border-radius
- Checked checkbox has #16a34a background and border, displays white checkmark
- Task text is 16px, font-weight 400, color #1a1a1a
- Task text wraps properly for long content
- Completed task text is #666666, has line-through, opacity 0.7
- Delete button has transparent background, #666666 color, 8px padding, 4px border-radius
- Delete button hover shows #fee2e2 background and #dc2626 color
- Interactive elements have minimum 44px touch target

REVIEWER FEEDBACK:
1. The task item should have a 1px solid #e0e0e0 border as per...
